title: FanDuel CEO: Prediction a ‘Great Complementary Offering'
description: Amy Howe, FanDuel CEO, says the company offers a complementary experience to its core sportsbook, with access to markets spanning sports, economic indicators, assets like the S&P 500 and gold, politics, and cultural events. She speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
